General.Name: Hisar Metal Industries Limited
General.Description: Hisar Metal Industries Limited manufactures and sells cold rolled stainless steel strips, and stainless steel tubes and pipes in India. It also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1990 and is based in Hisar, India.
General.Address: Near Industrial Development Colony, Hisar, India, 125005

2.Name: Mr. Vishesh Kumar Chugh
2.Title: GM of Fin., Compliance Officer & Company Sec.
